normal.description: A warm, bustling tavern with a crackling hearth and the smell of fresh ale. Regulars fill the wooden benches, and a bard strums softly in the corner.

atmosphere.lighting: Warm firelight from a large stone hearth
atmosphere.sounds: Murmur of conversation, clinking mugs, distant bard music
atmosphere.smells: Fresh ale, roasting meat, pipe smoke

burned.description: The once-cozy tavern lies in charred ruins. Ash and soot cover everything. The stone hearth stands alone amid collapsed timbers.

atmosphere.sounds: Wind through rubble, occasional creak of timber

rebuilt.description: The tavern has been rebuilt with fresh timber and a new stone hearth. It smells of sawdust and new beginnings. Fewer patrons, but a hopeful atmosphere.

atmosphere.sounds: Hammering in the distance, quiet conversation
